method.name: enqueue
method.description: Add to the back of the queue.

method.name: dequeue
method.description: Remove from the front of the queue.

method.name: peek
method.description: Peek the front of the queue.

method.name: clear
method.description: Erase all elements in the queue.

method.name: size
method.description: Get the size of the queue.

method.name: is_empty
method.description: Check whether the queue is empty.

method.name: to_array
method.description: Convert the queue into an Array.

method.name: from_array
method.description: Initialise this queue from an array.
